Title: Suspends the registration of a vehicle which has been documented five times within a twelve month period by a photo violation monitoring device for failure to comply with traffic-control indications
Summary: Suspends the registration of a vehicle which has been documented five times within a twelve month period by a photo violation monitoring device for failure of an operator thereof to comply with traffic-control indications for a period of six months.
LawCode: Add ยง1118, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to suspending the registration of a vehicle which has been documented five times by a photo violation monitoring device for failure of an operator thereof to comply with traffic-control indications
